props.name: new Point
props.desc: Point class

props.name: add
props.desc: Adds another point to this one and returns another one

props.name: addEquals
props.desc: Adds another point to this one

props.name: clone
props.desc: return a cloned instance of the point

props.name: distanceFrom
props.desc: Returns distance from this point and another one

props.name: divide
props.desc: Divides this point by a value and returns a new one TODO: rename in scalarDivide in 2.0

props.name: divideEquals
props.desc: Divides this point by a value TODO: rename in scalarDivideEquals in 2.0

props.name: eq
props.desc: Returns true if this point is equal to another one

props.name: gt
props.desc: Returns true if this point is greater another one

props.name: gte
props.desc: Returns true if this point is greater than or equal to another one

props.name: lerp
props.desc: Returns new point which is the result of linear interpolation with this one and another one

props.name: lt
props.desc: Returns true if this point is less than another one

props.name: lte
props.desc: Returns true if this point is less than or equal to another one

props.name: max
props.desc: Returns a new point which is the max of this and another one

props.name: midPointFrom
props.desc: Returns the point between this point and another one

props.name: min
props.desc: Returns a new point which is the min of this and another one

props.name: multiply
props.desc: Multiplies this point by a value and returns a new one TODO: rename in scalarMultiply in 2.0

props.name: multiplyEquals
props.desc: Multiplies this point by a value TODO: rename in scalarMultiplyEquals in 2.0

props.name: scalarAdd
props.desc: Adds value to this point and returns a new one

props.name: scalarAddEquals
props.desc: Adds value to this point

props.name: scalarSubtract
props.desc: Subtracts value from this point and returns a new one

props.name: scalarSubtractEquals
props.desc: Subtracts value from this point

props.name: setFromPoint
props.desc: Sets x/y of this point from another point

props.name: setX
props.desc: Sets x of this point

props.name: setXY
props.desc: Sets x/y of this point

props.name: setY
props.desc: Sets y of this point

props.name: subtract
props.desc: Subtracts another point from this point and returns a new one

props.name: subtractEquals
props.desc: Subtracts another point from this point

props.name: swap
props.desc: Swaps x/y of this point and another point

props.name: toString
props.desc: Returns string representation of this point
